step_original: Certificate of authenticity: Certificate of authenticity Tobacco
step_description: Provide a certificate of authenticity for Tobacco
step_howto_description: A certificate of authenticity will need to be provided, certifying that the tobacco being imported is flue-cured Virginia-type tobacco, light air-cured Burley-type tobacco (including Burley hybrids), light air-cured Maryland-type tobacco or fire-cured tobacco.
